  1. Oxford 3000
  2. Oxford 05

Words 401-500

  1. cause
    The heavy rain was the cause of the flood.

  2. CD
    She bought a new CD of her favorite band.

  3. ceiling
    The ceiling in the living room is painted white.

  4. celebrate
    We will celebrate her birthday next week.

  5. celebration
    The celebration lasted until midnight.

  6. celebrity
    The celebrity signed autographs for her fans.

  7. cell
    Each prisoner was locked in a small cell.

  8. cent
    The candy costs fifty cents.

  9. central
    The central station is always busy.

  10. centre
    The park is located in the centre of the city.

  11. century
    The building was constructed in the 19th century.

  12. ceremony
    The graduation ceremony was very emotional.

  13. certain
    I am certain that he will come to the party.

  14. certainly
    She certainly deserves the award for her hard work.

  15. chain
    He wore a gold chain around his neck.

  16. chair
    She sat on the chair near the window.

  17. chairman
    The chairman opened the meeting with a speech.

  18. challenge
    Climbing the mountain was a big challenge for him.

  19. champion
    The champion received a large trophy.

  20. chance
    This is your chance to show your talent.

  21. change
    She decided to change her hairstyle.

  22. channel
    He switched the TV to his favorite channel.

  23. chapter
    The first chapter of the book is very interesting.

  24. character
    The main character in the story is very brave.

  25. characteristic
    Honesty is a characteristic of a good leader.

  26. charge
    They will charge you a fee for late payment.

  27. charity
    The charity helps homeless people in the city.

  28. chart
    The chart shows the company’s sales growth.

  29. chat
    We had a quick chat before the meeting started.

  30. cheap
    The store sells cheap but good-quality clothes.

  31. cheat
    It is wrong to cheat during an exam.

  32. check
    Please check your work before submitting it.

  33. cheerful
    She is always cheerful and full of energy.

  34. cheese
    I like to eat bread with cheese for breakfast.

  35. chef
    The chef prepared a delicious meal for the guests.

  36. chemical
    The factory produces chemical products for cleaning.

  37. chemistry
    He is studying chemistry at the university.

  38. chest
    He felt pain in his chest after running.

  39. chicken
    We had fried chicken for dinner.

  40. chief
    The chief of the tribe welcomed the visitors.

  41. child
    The child played happily in the garden.

  42. childhood
    She has many happy memories of her childhood.

  43. chip
    He ate a bag of potato chips while watching TV.

  44. chocolate
    She gave me a box of chocolate as a gift.

  45. choice
    You have to make a choice between these two options.

  46. choose
    Please choose the color you like best.

  47. church
    They go to church every Sunday morning.

  48. cigarette
    Smoking a cigarette is harmful to your health.

  49. cinema
    We went to the cinema to watch a new movie.

  50. circle
    The children sat in a circle on the floor.

  51. circumstance
    Under these circumstances, we have to cancel the trip.

  52. cite
    He decided to cite a famous author in his essay.

  53. citizen
    Every citizen has the right to vote.

  54. city
    The city is known for its beautiful architecture.

  55. civil
    They are working on a civil engineering project.

  56. claim
    She claims that she saw a UFO last night.

  57. class
    The teacher asked the class to read the next chapter.

  58. classic
    This is a classic example of good teamwork.

  59. classical
    She enjoys listening to classical music.

  60. classroom
    The classroom was decorated with colorful posters.

  61. clause
    The sentence contains a main clause and a subordinate clause.

  62. clean
    Please clean your room before dinner.

  63. clear
    The instructions were clear and easy to follow.

  64. clearly
    He spoke clearly so everyone could understand him.

  65. clever
    She is a clever student who learns quickly.

  66. click
    Just click the button to start the program.

  67. client
    The lawyer met with her client to discuss the case.

  68. climate
    The climate in this region is very hot and dry.

  69. climb
    They decided to climb the mountain together.

  70. clock
    The clock on the wall shows the wrong time.

  71. close1
    Please close the door when you leave.

  72. close2
    The store is close to the train station.

  73. closed
    The shop is closed on Sundays.

  74. closely
    She watched the experiment closely to learn more.

  75. cloth
    He used a piece of cloth to clean the table.

  76. clothes
    She bought new clothes for the party.

  77. clothing
    The store sells winter clothing at a discount.

  78. cloud
    A dark cloud covered the sun.

  79. club
    He joined a local sports club to stay active.

  80. clue
    The detective found a clue at the crime scene.

  81. coach
    The coach encouraged the team to do their best.

  82. coal
    The train was powered by coal in the past.

  83. coast
    They walked along the coast to enjoy the view.

  84. coat
    She wore a warm coat because it was cold outside.

  85. code
    He wrote a code to solve the problem.

  86. coffee
    She drinks a cup of coffee every morning.

  87. coin
    He found a rare coin in his collection.

  88. cold
    The weather is very cold in winter.

  89. collapse
    The old building might collapse during the storm.

  90. colleague
    She had lunch with her colleague at the cafeteria.

  91. collect
    He likes to collect stamps from different countries.

  92. collection
    Her collection of books is very impressive.

  93. college
    He plans to go to college next year.

  94. colour
    The walls are painted in a bright colour.

  95. coloured
    She wore a brightly coloured dress to the party.

  96. column
    The table has three rows and two columns.

  97. combination
    The combination of colors made the painting unique.

  98. combine
    You need to combine the ingredients to make the cake.

  99. come
    Please come to the meeting on time.

  100. comedy
    The comedy show made everyone laugh.
